Title: accurateCastOrNull(x, T)
Description: Converts input value x to the specified data type T. Always returns Nullable type and returns NULL if the casted value is not representable in the target type.
x — Input value.T — The name of the returned data type.
The value, converted to the specified data type T.
Examples: SELECT    accurateCastOrNull(-1, 'UInt8') as uint8,    accurateCastOrNull(128, 'Int8') as int8,    accurateCastOrNull('Test', 'FixedString(2)') as fixed_string;
